title.rendered: Podcast interview: The Corp Dev Podcast

content.rendered: Our CEO Paul Resch went onto the Corp Dev podcast to talk SPACs, valuations in a Covid world, and share his insights with host Darryl Bull, listen here or on Spotify, Apple Music, or other platforms

excerpt.rendered: Our CEO Paul Resch went onto the Corp Dev podcast […]
